```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(nflreadr)
```

```{r}
plays <- load_pbp(2022)
```

```{r}
head(plays)
```

```{r}
type_plays <- c("pass", "run")
plays |>
  filter(play_type %in% type_plays) |>
  filter(posteam == "MIA") |>
  filter(week == 3) 
```
